com.marcospassos.phpserializer

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marcospassos.phpserializer.Context

  • public class Context
extends Object
    Manages the serialization process, including keeping track of references and delegating adapters.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marcos Passos

    • Constructor Summary

      Context(AdapterRegistry registry, NamingStrategy namingStrategy, FieldExclusionStrategy exclusionStrategy)
      Creates a context.

    • Method Detail

      • getNamingStrategy

        public NamingStrategy getNamingStrategy()
        Returns the naming strategy.
        Returns:
        The naming strategy.

      • getExclusionStrategy

        public FieldExclusionStrategy getExclusionStrategy()
        Returns the exclusion strategy.
        Returns:
        The exclusion strategy.

      • getDepth

        public int getDepth()
        Returns the traversal depth. The depth is equivalent to the stack size. If the stack is empty returns 0; if the stack contains one element, returns 1 and so on.
        Returns:
        The traversal depth.

      • getParent

        public Object getParent()
        Returns the parent object that contains the current object.
        Returns:
        The parent object.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the traversal stack is empty or if the object is on the top of the stack.

      • getTraversalStack

        public List<Object> getTraversalStack()
        Return the traversal stack.
        Returns:
        The traversal stack.

      • write

        public void write(Object value,
                  Writer writer)
        Writes the provided value using the specified writer.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to write.
        writer - The writer to write the value with.

      • setReference

        public void setReference(int pointer,
                         Object object)
        Tracks the reference of the specified object.
        Parameters:
        pointer - The reference index.
        object - The value.

      • getReference

        public int getReference(Object object)
        Returns the index of the reference for the specified object.
        Parameters:
        object - The object which the reference points to.
        Returns:
        A positive integer representing the index of the reference for the specified object or -1, if no reference for the specified value exists.
